github_body:
Map changes:
* #323 Pull indices are now visible on all pulls to help identification.
* #330 Pulls are now loaded once instead of every time you switch a floor. Fixed various issues when switching floors. Increased general performance.
discord_body:
v3.0.6 (2020/06/03)(https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.6)
Map changes:
    * #323 Pull indices are now visible on all pulls to help identification.
    * #330 Pulls are now loaded once instead of every time you switch a floor. Fixed various issues when switching floors. Increased general performance.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.6](https://keystone.guru/release/v3.0.6)

Map changes:
* [\#323](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/323) Pull indices are now visible on all pulls to help identification.
* [\#330](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/330) Pulls are now loaded once instead of every time you switch a floor. Fixed various issues when switching floors. Increased general performance.

changes.change: Pull indices are now visible on all pulls to help identification.
Pulls are now loaded once instead of every time you switch a floor. Fixed various issues when switching floors. Increased general performance.
